titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Virginia Woolf letter, September 13, 1921
titlestmt.subtitle: Virginia Woolf letter C0288
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elizabeth Beckman

publicationstmt.publisher: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Letter from Viriginia Woolf to her brother-in-law Clive Bell.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Woolf letter, C0288, Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Adjunct Professor Diana P. Decker (BA, history, and MA, foreign languages, George Mason University) on July 1, 2009.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Virginia Woolf letter must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Single letter from Virginia Woolf to her brother-in-law Clive Bell, dated September 13, 1921.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing completed by Elizabeth Beckman in June 2016. EAD markup completed by Elizabeth Beckman in June 2016.
